name: Undercover Cop
description:
A collaborative project made for Mini Jam 60 in 72 hours by Jeremy Stepp (programming, initial proposal writing),  Optical Starline (Art, Last Minute Writing), Soapbones (Music). A 3-D first person puzzle/murder mystery /heist game reminiscent stylistically of early 3-D-ish games like The Elder Scrolls: Arena and Doom. A short adventure ensues, with multiple endings (that don't exist yet) where you try to solve the murder, and get out with the money!

(DISCLAIMER: This project is largely unfinished in terms of content, but it was still quite fun to make! Plus the shadow mode is super creepy.)
